incidents.name: Twilio Messaging Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging was degraded for 4 minutes between 08:00 and 08:04 Pacific Time on 10/15/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced 500 errors after a timeout when sending messages.  The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Meta’s WhatsApp Cloud API Outage Affecting Outbound Message Statuses and Inbound Messages

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The incident has been resolved.

We continue to monitor the incident that caused service interruption from Meta that is disrupting WhatsApp messaging. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring the incident that caused service interruption from Meta that is disrupting WhatsApp messaging. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption from Meta that is disrupting WhatsApp messaging. Customers may experience their message status remaining in a SENT or “DELIVERY UNKNOWN” status. However, the actual outbound message may be delivered, and inbound messages may be delayed. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption from Meta that is disrupting WhatsApp messaging. Customers may experience their message status remaining in a SENT or “DELIVERY UNKNOWN” status. However, the actual outbound message may be delivered, and inbound messages may be delayed. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption from Meta that is disrupting WhatsApp messaging. Customers may experience their message status remaining in a SENT or “DELIVERY UNKNOWN” status. However, the actual outbound message may be delivered, and inbound messages may be delayed. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue in increase of WhatsApp Outbound Messages in Delivery_Unkown or Sent Status. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Message Creation Using Content Templates Impacted

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Our on-call engineers have identified an issue with message creation requests using content templates encountering 5xx errors. This impacts products like Programmable Messaging, Conversations, etc. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Twilio.com was degraded for 13 minutes minutes between 09:03 AM and 09:16 Pacific Time on 10/14/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced error 403 on twilio.com, customers.twilio.com and segment.com. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Conversations and Sync Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conversations and Sync were degraded for 6 minutes between 07:56 and 08:02 Pacific Time on 10/14/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced increased amount of errors and increased latencies. The issue has now been resolved.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We've become aware of an issue with a single Australian phone number. The issue prevents the user from saving the configuration and routing the number to the desired region. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating for any widespread. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Intermittent One-Way Audio Issues with Symbio Carrier

incident_updates.body: We experienced intermittent one-way audio issues with the Symbio carrier. The issues were characterized by high latency, affecting the clarity of calls for a subset of users. During this period, customers may have experienced communication disruptions. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failure and Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in the US for Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: SMS Delivery Failure and Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in the US for Subset of Short Codes was degraded for 27 minutes between 12:00 PM and 12:27 PM Pacific Time on 10/11/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Billing Information for Super SIM and Programmable Wireless is Delayed via API and UI

incident_updates.body: The incident has been resolved. All pending events with the exception of ~1.82% have been processed. Most of which is likely to be duplicates. The system is back to normal. All customers should be able to access the previously missing data via the API and the UI.

As of Wednesday, October 9th, 4:00 PM UTC, we have resumed near-real-time processing for the amount billed fields in the Usage API and Console insights for both Programmable Wireless and Super SIM.
However, we are still facing issues with missing billed amounts for the following intervals:
Monday, October 7th, 8:00 AM UTC – Tuesday, October 8th, 9:30 AM UTC: 30% of usage events are missing.
Tuesday, October 8th, 9:30 AM UTC – Wednesday, October 9th, 4:10 PM UTC: 100% of usage events are missing.
The team has identified the issue and is working on a fix. The missing usage events and billed amounts for these intervals will be reprocessed and backfilled early next week.

We will post the update in the next 24 hours or sooner if more information will become available.

We are still experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is still working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 16 hours or sooner if more information will become available.

We are still experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is still working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 8 hours or sooner if more information will become available.

We are still experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is still working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 4 hours or sooner if more information will become available.

We are still experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is still working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 2 hours or sooner if more information will become available.

Since 2024-10-08 1:00PM UTC we experience the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 1 hour or sooner if more information will become available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue, billing information for Super SIM and Programmable Wireless is delayed via API and UI. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
